Action.author: tuand
Action.body: Also, is this still needed ? From December discussion, I thought this is no longer a V1.0 item.

Action.author: kchristidis

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: As we have discussed the orderer will not be providing this functionality. Instead this should be taken care of by the clients. Closing this.
